title: Pea Ridge National Military Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips Pea Ridge NMP is a great place to take your students! We offer a 7-mile drive through the battlefield, a museum and optional ranger programs.  Fill out and send in a Fee Waiver to schedule your group today! All Field Trips     Traveling Trunks Pea Ridge National Military Park is now offering Traveling Trunks for local educators to rent in order to aid the study of the American Civil War and the Battle of Pea Ridge. All Traveling Trunks
